name: Jina AI
natural_language_description: 这是 Jina AI 节点。主要用于: Interact with Jina AI API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: reader

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: deepResearch
available_options: Deep Research (值: deepResearch) - Research a topic and generate a structured research report

url.name: url
url.description: The URL to fetch content from
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: The URL to fetch content from | (必填项)

simplify.name: simplify
simplify.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simplify.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: maxReturnedSources (值: None) - The maximum number of URLs to include in the final answer
prioritizeSources (值: None) - A list of domains that are given a higher priority for content retrieval
excludeSources (值: None) - A list of domains to be strictly excluded from content retrieval
siteFilter (值: None) - Restrict search to specific websites

searchQuery.name: searchQuery
searchQuery.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Query | (必填项)

researchQuery.name: researchQuery
researchQuery.description: The topic or question for the AI to research
researchQuery.natural_language_description: 参数名: Research Query | 作用: The topic or question for the AI to research | (必填项)

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
